participant_1.background:
I enjoy driving my classic car along the winding roads near my lake house.
I am not very fashionable but I do like to wear nice clothes on special occasions.
I like to go golfing on sunny days with my friends because it is a fun and relaxing way to get some exercise.
i believe in fairytales.
my mother is a dentist.

I wish I could travel the world and play music like my brother.
if i were to be reincarnated , i would want to come back as a hippopotamus.
i m the oldest of three boys.
my favorite food is italian.
i ve been a vegan since i was 5.

content.text: I'm doing well, thank you! I am a bit bored, so I decided to talk to someone on here. What are some of your hobbies?
I like to play music and I want to travel the world. How about you?
I love going golfing and I really enjoy driving my classic car. I also like to spend time at my lake house.
That sounds really nice. I wish I had a lake house. I've been a vegan since I was 5.
Wow, that's a long time to be vegan! I'm impressed. What made you decide to do that?
I decided to become a vegan because I love animals. I think it's wrong to eat them.
I agree, I don't like to eat meat either. I think it's cruel to animals.
I'm glad to hear that you agree. I think it's really important to be compassionate towards animals.
I do too. I think it's important to treat all animals with respect.
I totally agree. I'm glad we agree about this.
